titles: More reasons for the Christian religion and no reason against it, or, A second appendix to the Reasons of the Christian religion being I. an answer to a letter from an unknown person charging the Holy Scriptures with contradictions, II. some animadversions on a tractate De Veritate, written by ... Edward Herbert, Baron of Cherbury ... / by Richard Baxter.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691. Reasons of the Christian religion.
notes: Page 65 has faded print. Pages 60-85 photographed from Cambridge University Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
keywords: Herbert of Cherbury, Edward Herbert, --  Baron, 1583-1648. --  De veritate.
